description: Generate test files for the manifest via tool-calling add_file; reply DONE when finished.

input_variables.name: files_manifest
input_variables.description: One-per-line list of file paths to create (e.g., tests/email-service/smoke.json).

input_variables.name: file_roles_json
input_variables.description: JSON object mapping file paths to their roles (AUTH, SMOKE, CRUD).

input_variables.name: role_contexts_json
input_variables.description: JSON object mapping roles to their specific endpoint contexts.

input_variables.name: endpoints_context
input_variables.description: Compact endpoints list (method, path, summary, auth, request content type).
